Text: #G28# As a user, I want to search and discover music using content identification or fingerprinting.
Benefit: I can use content identification or fingerprinting

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to receive content recommendations from similar profiles.
Benefit: I can receive content recommendations from similar profiles

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to receive content recommendations based on most relevant news events in my area.
Benefit: I can receive content recommendations based on most relevant news events in my area

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to identify persons in videos, and receive related information about them.
Benefit: receive related information about them

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to identify products in videos, and receive related information about them.
Benefit: receive related information about them

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to identify broadcaster logos in videos, and receive related information about them.
Benefit: receive related information about broadcaster logos in videos

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to identify brands in videos, and receive related information about them.
Benefit: receive related information about brands in videos

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to take a picture or upload an image, so that I am recommended with videos related to that picture or image.
Benefit: I am recommended with videos related to that picture or image

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to walk around, access content using a geographical map and be informed if there are videos covering the area, monuments or any other relevant point of interest.
Benefit: access content using a geographical map and be informed if there are videos covering the area, monuments or any other relevant point of interest

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to search content items using automatic speech recognition.
Benefit: I can search content items using automatic speech recognition

Text: #G28# As an admin, I want to see, validate and edit segmentation of videos.
Benefit: I can see, validate and edit segmentation of videos

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to search and discover music based on my profile.
Benefit: based on my profile

Text: #G28# As an admin, I want to annotate news video segments and extract a topic for each segment.
Benefit: I can extract a topic for each segment

Text: #G28# As an admin, I want to filter and rank videos based on A/V quality aspects.
Benefit: based on A/V quality aspects

Text: #G28# As an admin, I want to get a quick assessment of whether audio material has been edited before the upload.
Benefit: quick assessment of whether audio material has been edited before the upload

Text: #G28# As an admin, I want to prefilter nudity content.
Benefit: prevent nudity content from being displayed

Text: #G28# As an admin, I want to prefilter content using search based on low-level asset information.
Benefit: I can prefilter content using search based on low-level asset information

Text: #G28# As an admin, I want to automatically validated the ingested contents for copyright infringement.
Benefit: for copyright infringement

Text: #G28# As an admin, I want to prefilter the content using search on high-level asset information such as metadata and tags either recognized by the system of provided by the user.
Benefit: I can easily find and filter content based on high-level asset information

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to assess how interesting or appealing or complex a picture is based on automated analysis, citizen annotations, and comments on Talk.
Benefit: to determine how interesting or appealing or complex a picture is

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to detect when a scientist should be prompted to look at a subject, based on annotations and information from Talk comments.
Benefit: I can detect when a scientist should be prompted to look at a subject based on annotations and information from Talk comments

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to identify volunteer types.
#G28# As a user, I want to search and discover music based on other users similar to myself.
Benefit: I can find music based on other users similar to myself

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to preclassify the Galaxy Zoo images using simple low-level image features.
Benefit: I can preclassify the Galaxy Zoo images using simple low-level image features

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to automatically detect Snapshot Serengeti images with no classifiable animals in them.
Benefit: identify images with no classifiable animals

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to perform automatic image series detection for the case of timestamping malfunction in Snapshot Serengeti images.
Benefit: detect timestamping malfunction in Snapshot Serengeti images

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to perform automatic animal species preclassification in Snapshot Serengeti.
Benefit: improve efficiency of animal species preclassification in Snapshot Serengeti

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to perform automatic animal attribute preclassification in Snapshot Serengeti.
Benefit: improve efficiency of animal attribute preclassification in Snapshot Serengeti

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to perform automatic animal number detection in Snapshot Serengeti.
Benefit: I can improve the efficiency of animal number detection in Snapshot Serengeti

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to perform automatic segmentation or localization of plankton in Plankton Portal.
Benefit: I can automate the process of segmenting or localizing plankton in Plankton Portal.

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to automatically detect Plankton Portal images with no classifiable plankton in them.
Benefit: identify images with no classifiable plankton

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to perform automatic detection of plankton size or orientation in Plankton Portal images.
Benefit: I can detect plankton size or orientation in Plankton Portal images

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to perform automatic preclassification of plankton species in Plankton Portal images.
Benefit: improve efficiency of plankton species classification

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to search and discover music or ringback tones similar to a given music video based on content similarity.
Benefit: I can find music or ringback tones similar to a given music video based on content similarity

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to perform automatic worm motion analysis to reduce video duration in Worm Watch Lab.
Benefit: reduce video duration in Worm Watch Lab

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to automatically detect the time in a Worm Watch Lab video where the worm lays an egg.
Benefit: identify the time in the video when the worm lays an egg

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to detect important features such as areas of flooding, damage, temporary shelters, blocked roads etc in the satellite images.
Benefit: I can identify important features in the satellite images

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to assess the probability/weight of a volunteer's classification based on their experience.
Benefit: to determine the probability/weight based on their experience

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to perform prefiltering of the images to remove artefacts such as bright stars and camera read errors.
Benefit: to remove artefacts such as bright stars and camera read errors

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to detect moving and transient objects in the images.
Benefit: to detect moving and transient objects in the images

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to remove background noise and distracting sounds from the audio files.
Benefit: improve audio quality

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to group whale calls that are similar.
Benefit: to group whale calls that are similar

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to identify the number of whales heard in a single audio file.
Benefit: to determine the number of whales heard in a single audio file

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to know when I should interrupt a volunteer.
Benefit: I should know when to interrupt a volunteer

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to search and discover music by exploiting enriched metadata and image tags, so that I find related artists, new genre, or other relevant listening path.
Benefit: find related artists, new genre, or other relevant listening path

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to know whether I should interrupt a volunteer with text, an image, or a video.
Benefit: I can determine whether to interrupt a volunteer with text, an image, or a video

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to know when I should educate a volunteer.
Benefit: I should know when to educate a volunteer

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to know whether I should educate a volunteer with text, an image, or a video.
Benefit: know whether I should educate a volunteer with text, an image, or a video

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to know which piece of education I should give to a volunteer.
Benefit: I can provide the appropriate education to a volunteer

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to know when a volunteer has made an interesting comment on a subject.
Benefit: I can be aware of interesting comments made by volunteers on subjects

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to know when Zoonibot should comment on a subject.
Benefit: I want to know when Zoonibot should comment on a subject.

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to know when Zoonibot should give an explanation.
Benefit: know when Zoonibot should give an explanation

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to know what Zoonibot should say to a volunteer.
Benefit: I want to know what Zoonibot should say to a volunteer

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to group subjects by similarity.
Benefit: I can group subjects by similarity

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to recommend different projects to volunteers based on their previous experiences.
Benefit: to recommend different projects to volunteers based on their previous experiences

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to upload tagged videos and have tags available for all further processing steps.
Benefit: have tags available for all further processing steps

Text: #G28# As an admin, I want to see a summary of articles, so that I reuse them.
Benefit: I can reuse articles

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to view thumbnail sequences of video segments.
Benefit: I can easily navigate through video content

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to get info about similar video items and segments.
Benefit: I can get information about similar video items and segments.

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to get info about perceptually similar video items and segments.
Benefit: I can find perceptually similar video items and segments
